page.title: 17SHOPS
page.content: As can be seen from the survey count there are very few shops in the area. Because of this the majority of families tend to do a bulk weekly shop in other places using Super or Hypermarkets.The most popular areas for this are Hanley, Kidsgrove, Talke Pits,Alsager and Congleton.The local shops however do manage to survive on day to day selling day to day items. There is great concern that there is not a bank or building society in the area.However with most people having access to a car the travelling causes them little hardship.
